Study.Citation: Hendin, H.M., & Cheek, J.M. (1997). Assessing Hypersensitive Narcissism: A Re-examination of Murray’s Narcissism Scale. Journal of Research in Personality, 31, 588-599.

License.en: Freely available for research purposes (verify with original publication)
License.de: Frei verfügbar für Forschungszwecke (mit Originalpublikation überprüfen)

Instructions.en: Please read each statement and select the response that best describes you.
Instructions.de: Bitte lesen Sie jede Aussage und wählen Sie die Antwort, die Sie am besten beschreibt.

Description.en: I can become entirely absorbed in thinking about my personal affairs, my health, my cares or my relations to others.
Description.de: I can become entirely absorbed in thinking about my personal affairs, my health, my cares or my relations to others.

0.en: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree
0.de: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree

4.en: very characteristic or true, strongly agree
4.de: very characteristic or true, strongly agree

Description.en: My feelings are easily hurt by ridicule or the slighting remarks of others.
Description.de: My feelings are easily hurt by ridicule or the slighting remarks of others.

0.en: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree
0.de: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree

4.en: very characteristic or true, strongly agree
4.de: very characteristic or true, strongly agree

Description.en: When I enter a room I often become self-conscious and feel that the eyes of others are upon me.
Description.de: When I enter a room I often become self-conscious and feel that the eyes of others are upon me.

0.en: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree
0.de: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree

4.en: very characteristic or true, strongly agree
4.de: very characteristic or true, strongly agree

Description.de: I dislike sharing the credit of an achievement with others.

0.en: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree
0.de: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree

4.en: very characteristic or true, strongly agree
4.de: very characteristic or true, strongly agree

Description.de: I feel that I have enough on my hands without worrying about other people's troubles.

0.en: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree
0.de: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree

4.en: very characteristic or true, strongly agree

0.en: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree
0.de: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree

4.en: very characteristic or true, strongly agree
4.de: very characteristic or true, strongly agree

Description.en: I often interpret the remarks of others in a personal way.
Description.de: I often interpret the remarks of others in a personal way.

0.en: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree
0.de: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree

4.en: very characteristic or true, strongly agree

Description.de: I easily become wrapped up in my own interests and forget the existence of others.

Description.en: I dislike being with a group unless I know that I am appreciated by at least one of those present.
Description.de: I dislike being with a group unless I know that I am appreciated by at least one of those present.

0.en: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree
0.de: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree

4.de: very characteristic or true, strongly agree

Description.en: I am secretly "put out" or annoyed when other people come to me with their troubles, asking me for my time and sympathy.
Description.de: I am secretly "put out" or annoyed when other people come to me with their troubles, asking me for my time and sympathy.

0.en: very uncharacteristic or untrue, strongly disagree
